name: ChatOutsource
description:
Chat Outsource is a platform that provides a 3rd party fully managed team of chat agents for entertaining your website visitors. Chat Outsource engages your online website visitors in real time and optimizes lead generation by effectively up-sell and cross-sell you’re offering to potential buyers.
Our fully managed, end to end live chat support consistently maintains the highest level of customer satisfaction and bridge the communication between you and your customers. With Chat Outsource, there will be no more waiting or queue on your website. Our live chat agents answer your web site visitor’s query in run-time and convert visitors concerns into favorable feedbacks. 
Chat Outsource understands that business is all about making satisfactory customers. Our research confirms that many businesses fail because they are unable to build a satisfactory relationship with them. We do realize the importance of a customer; therefore we do our best to increase customer retention and make sure to leave a good impression on you website visitor to make them come back. Our approach to work helps us building a positive company image of our clients in their customer's mind.
